page.title: 11SKELMERSDALE - SHOPPING
page.content: The main shopping area in the New Town of Skelmersdale is known as the {Concourse.}This is a large covered shopping precinct on two floors with all the usual shopping facilities including Chain Stores, Banks, Building Societies, Supermarkets etc. on the top floor. The ground floor offers a wide range of 'market style' permanent stalls selling everything from second hand items of all types, food, clothing and electrical goods. Adjacent to the Concourse is the Nye Bevan Swimming Pool, the Police Station which is the main Police base for West Lancashire and a very well equipped Library with excellent modern facilities. The{Ribble Bus Company Bus Station also ajoins the Concourse as does a very large{Taxi Rank,}taxis being a form of transport widely used in Skelmersdale.
